index.getdata.php File Reference

This script is a semi-function that returns $arrDNAUserData and $oTicks. More...

Detailed Description

This script is a semi-function that returns $arrDNAUserData and $oTicks.

Input Variables
  • $strDate2Check Date to be check (str 'YYYY-mm-dd')
  • $numDateTZ Time zone (int in hours from GMT)
  • $numMinEndSize Min length of articles at the end of the day that is OK (int in bytes)
  • $isAccuracyNeeded If true RC must not be used.
Return data
  • $oTicks Ticks object that gathers some info on times
  • $arrDNAUserData Output data (user-centric) 
        array
    (
        user_id (int) => array
        (
            'user_name' => str,
            'total_ok' => int,
            'total_nonok' => int,
            'total_len' => int (in bytes),
            'pages' => array
            (
                [0..n] => array
                (
                    'page_id' => int,
                    'page_title' => str,
                    'start_len' => int (in bytes),
                    'end_len' => int (in bytes),
                    'is_ok' => true/false,
                )
            )
        )
    )
